extensionDescription.message: Uploads your large attachments to your own cloud and instead inserts a public link into your email.

extensionName.message: FileLink Provider for OwnCloud and NextCloud

serverURLDesc.message: Your Personal WebDAV file path can be found under Settings in the lower left of the Files screen.

tokenDesc.message: An app token (preferrable) or password. (Generate an app token via User -> Settings -> Security -> App Token)  WARNING: this token is stored insecurely.  NOTE: this may require the OAuth2 plugin on the server.

pathDesc.message: The path where the files are stored in OwnCloud (it must already exist and begin and end with a '/')
